column4: Dear Lazyweb: What's the easiest way to tell apt-get that I don't want to update a particular package, and to stop bothering me about it?
I always think of the nerd vs geek divide as being one largely based on social skills.
Yeah, it is...The geeks are the antisocial ones
really? I think of the nerds as being bereft of social skills, while geeks have their own chic thing going on
